name: nonequivalent
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having a different amount, value, purpose, quality, etc.: Nonequivalent fractions are not equal to each other. The translation reviewer identified a number of nonequivalent translations.
More examplesFewer examplesThe two roles are nonequivalent, completely different jobs which require unique skills and experience.Nonequivalent vocabulary items occur when one of the items has a culturally specific designation. In this experimental design, participants in one group are exposed to a particular treatment, a non-equivalent group is not exposed to any treatment, and then the two groups are compared.
